EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Lamont,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful. Please follow the link below:
http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html
If you have questions or would like to set up a follow up call, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK.
Thanks you and I look forward to speaking with you again soon! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
